emoji 0.2.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

List all emoji with a given keyword

Source: R/emoji.R
emoji_find.Rd

This function will look in emoji_keyword to report back the given emojis.

emoji_find(keyword)

Arguments

keyword

Character, Emoji keyword.

Examples

emoji_find("happy")

#> # A tibble: 5 × 2
#>   name         emoji
#>   <chr>        <chr>
#> 1 grinning     😀   
#> 2 smiley       😃   
#> 3 smile        😄   
#> 4 laughing     😆   
#> 5 raising_hand 🙋   
emoji_find("cat")

#> # A tibble: 12 × 2
#>    name            emoji
#>    <chr>           <chr>
#>  1 smiley_cat      😺   
#>  2 smile_cat       😸   
#>  3 joy_cat         😹   
#>  4 heart_eyes_cat  😻   
#>  5 smirk_cat       😼   
#>  6 kissing_cat     😽   
#>  7 scream_cat      🙀   
#>  8 crying_cat_face 😿   
#>  9 pouting_cat     😾   
#> 10 cat             🐱   
#> 11 cat2            🐈   
#> 12 black_cat       🐈‍⬛   
emoji_find("family")

#> # A tibble: 26 × 2
#>    name                       emoji
#>    <chr>                      <chr>
#>  1 family                     👪   
#>  2 family_man_woman_boy       👨‍👩‍👦   
#>  3 family_man_woman_girl      👨‍👩‍👧   
#>  4 family_man_woman_girl_boy  👨‍👩‍👧‍👦   
#>  5 family_man_woman_boy_boy   👨‍👩‍👦‍👦   
#>  6 family_man_woman_girl_girl 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧   
#>  7 family_man_man_boy         👨‍👨‍👦   
#>  8 family_man_man_girl        👨‍👨‍👧   
#>  9 family_man_man_girl_boy    👨‍👨‍👧‍👦   
#> 10 family_man_man_boy_boy     👨‍👨‍👦‍👦   
#> # … with 16 more rows
